SELECT emb_appointment.* FROM emb_appointment WHERE 1=1
AND emb_appointment.status LIKE CONCAT('%',#{status},'%')
AND emb_appointment.studio_id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{studioId},'%')
AND emb_appointment.phone LIKE CONCAT('%',#{phone},'%')

SELECT emb_appointment.* FROM emb_appointment WHERE 1=1 AND emb_appointment.customer_id = #{customerId}
AND emb_appointment.status LIKE CONCAT('%',#{status},'%')
